page.title: 04EDUCATION IN GRIN'TON AREA
page.content: There are 3 C.of E. Primary Schools, and 1 Secondary Modern School;at Chat- burn(56 pupils),Grin'ton(39),Wadd'ton\ W.Bradford(107)and Bowland(330).The buildings are well maintained and are attractively situated.Children attend Primary School from 5-11 yrs., then are selected for Grammar,Second- ary,or Comprehensive education.Many children are transported to school because of the distances involved. School lunches are available.Subjects studied include Maths.,English Lang. and Literature,R.E.,History,Geography, Gen.Science,Music,Handcraft,Art,Games. More specialised Secondary subjects include Agriculture,Horsemanship,Bi- ology,Chemistry,Physics,French,German, Geometric Drawing,Woodwork,Metalwork, Dom.Science,Needlework,Typing and Computing.Careers advice,and work ex- perience is available.
